name: Running Santa - Candy climb Free
description:
Exciting, funny runner - Running Santa Claus!

Run along the walls of the abyss, collecting candy for children while skirting obstacles. Climb above all your friends, right to the clouds! You might find bonuses and power ups very useful. Both children and pro palyers would find the game very interesting.


- Gameplay full of fun
- Gradual difficulty increase - for beginners and pros
- Cool boosters
- Power-ups shop
- Leaderboards rating
- Various quests

Our game is just starting its way! Watch for regular updates — there is lots of upcoming interesting stuff! In the next update you will find:

* Achievements
* Tricky goblins
* More bright graphics!
